description:
The story takes place between episodes seven and eight. In December, Eila Ilmatar Juutilainen and Sanya V. Litvyak of the 501st Joint Fighter Wing are carrying supplies to the 502nd Joint Fighter Wing. They take a break at the Petersburg base until the new year, and are having a good time with the members of the 502nd until the Neuroi attack.
Source: ANN
